Configuration Table

Setting Default Description Required
host localhost Database host address Yes
port 5432 Database port number No
ssl false Enable SSL connection No
pool_size 10 Connection pool size No
Note: All settings can be overridden via environment variables.

Wide Table with Many Columns

ID Name Type Format Required Default Description
1 user_id string uuid true - Unique user identifier
2 username string alphanumeric true - Unique username
3 email string email true - User email address
4 role enum user|admin false user User role
5 active boolean true|false false true Account status

Status Codes Table

Code Status Description Action
200 OK Request successful None
201 Created Resource created None
400 Bad Request Invalid input Check request parameters
401 Unauthorized Missing or invalid credentials Authenticate and retry
404 Not Found Resource not found Verify resource ID
500 Server Error Internal server error Contact support
